basis: User avoided binge and engaged in non-eating coping behaviors (breathing, fullness rating, 10-minute walk, water) after lunch; no additional food intake described.
cognitive_dissonance: No explicit internal conflict; user expresses alignment with goal and reports relief from urge.
negative_thought_patterns: No explicit self-defeating beliefs; mild cravings mentioned but not accompanied by blame or hopelessness.
emotional_triggers: Post-meal cravings/an urge to binge; relief and sense of control following walking and hydration.
coaching_notes: Maintain a warm, collaborative tone; keep post-meal cues short and actionable; consider adding an 'urge-action' plan (e.g., pause, breathe, move, message a support buddy) and track cravings to tailor interventions over time.
